attributes.contentHtml:
Korbs Don't use overrated panels like Pterodactyl, Pufferpanel, etc. I'm just sick of seeing them over and over again. Some of the more successful hosts that you do see around today use their own panel and their own code. So, sit down and take the time to create your own panel. Don't know how? Just hire a developer who knows how. It's best that you have a decent backend and a sexy backend for your customers to enjoy and to have a smooth experience. Make sure to do case studies and improve your panel.

@Snyder please read stuff before replying. All i can see from Korbs's post is a self advertisment.

From my perspective: he got fired, so he needs a new company to work with, hence he a made an informative advertisement.

attributes.title: I'm Sick of Hositng Companies and This Needs to be Taken Care of
